author: mmusich
body: Fixing track-refitting sequences to avoid  MeasurementTrackerEvent issues as discussed in other PRs such as #6244 and #6233. Cleanup of the Cosmic data selection and introduction of the warning when using starting conditions for the Global position record with multiple IOVs as in V00-28-00 cvs tag (never entered in release)
title: Fix HIP configuration for CMSSW_7_X
